ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:25:03 [Issue ID 4000-77682] urn:comicvine:4000-77682 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 04:57:09. [Issue ID 97391]
ComicInfo.Summary: Hektor returns to Troy with the news that Priam's sister Hesione does not wish to leave Salamis. Paris volunteers to abduct Hesione. Helenus has a vision of Troy's doom.
